input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile

Item keywords:
Shake 'n Go Racers put the control of speed and power into kids hands
Just shake it up to start the "engine`"
The more you shake it up, the longer it goes
Hear cool phrases every time you let it go
Collect all the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends: Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer, Batmobile and Mr. Freeze Racer
Goes up to 20 feet

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The more you shake it, the longer it goes! With the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile, kids put the power and speed of this super vehicle into their own hands. Just shake it up to start the "engine", then let it go! The more it's shaken, the further it can go - up to 20 feet! Kids will love the cool phrases that are heard each time it's set free. Collect all four of the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends vehicles: Batmobile, Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer and Mr. Freeze Racer. Each sold separately.
input_text.Response B: The Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile is a top-of-the-line vehicle designed to cater to the needs of young adventurers. Equipped with the latest technologies and features, this sleek, powerful vehicle will take you on a thrilling ride through the streets of Gotham City. The Batmobile is powered by a unique 'shake-to-go' motion that allows it to zoom forward with great speed and precision. When you shake it up, the Batmobile emits cool phrases that will get you pumped up for the adventures ahead. Due to its compact design and lightweight construction, the Batmobile is easy to carry around and can be taken anywhere. Collect all the vehicles in the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends line to create the ultimate fleet of heroes and villains.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
